references.paper_title: Nerf: Representing scenes as neural radiance fields for view synthesis
references.reason: This paper introduces the concept of Neural Radiance Fields (NeRFs), which serves as the foundational inspiration for the proposed Acoustic Volume Rendering (AVR) method.

references.paper_title: Mesh2ir: Neural acoustic impulse response generator for complex 3d scenes
references.reason: This work is a direct comparison and competitor to the proposed AVR method, providing a benchmark for evaluating performance.
This paper introduces the Neural Acoustic Fields, which is another key prior work directly related to the proposed method in the paper.

references.paper_title: Real acoustic fields: An audio-visual room acoustics dataset and benchmark
references.reason: This paper provides the real-world dataset used in the experiments, which is critical for evaluating the performance of the proposed method.

references.paper_title: Soundspaces 2.0: A simulation platform for visual-acoustic learning
references.reason: This paper introduces a simulation platform used in the paper, offering a more realistic setting for evaluating the accuracy of impulse response modeling.
